In perfect harmony with the two hectares of surrounding botanical gardens, the fifteen luxurious suites and the numerous panoramic terraces of this small earthly paradise located in Alassio invite you to savor moments of great pleasure, enjoying the satisfying sensation that the splendid view of the Ligurian Sea offers.
